attributes.action: Calling for our Prime Minster to set up examples of acknowledging the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christ Loves UK is petitioning for our leaders (especially the Prime Minister and the leaders of the other Parties) to set up examples of (1) acknowledging the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ and demonstrate publicly the knowledge of the Holy Bible. (2) Attending church services in public and in full view of the camera. (3) Election time, the Lord Jesus Christ and His Gospels to be included in their manifestos.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
